As described on our Cookie Information page, we contract with third-party advertising networks in order to deliver relevant Evernote advertisements to you across the Internet and to manage our communications with you.
We do not share your account information or user activity history with third parties for the purpose of enabling them to deliver their advertisements to you.
In addition, we do not share with marketing partners or Service Providers a hashed identifier derived from the personal information you have submitted to us (such as your email address).
